name: Traptoon
description:
Welcome to Traptoon, a cartoon metroidvania created for the GameJam MVM 14. 

It has been created in only one month and with a small team of 15 people that are learning their ways into the videogames industry.

If you try this game, you like what you see, but you are disappointed about the few containt, don´t worry. This is only what we were able to do in one month. We still have planned a lot more that´s coming early 2022. 

Please, have fun trying this little demo of what is gonna be Traptoon and feel free to leave a comment.

PD: Please, read the README file that come with the downloable zip, there is important information for you to know.
